page.title: 17FROM WYBOSTON TO ST.NEOTS.
page.content: {WYBOSTON LAND ASSOCIATION SETTLEMENT {SCHEME.}Although much of this land has in recent years passed into private hands, the work remains very similar. The small holdings and their greenhouses, each set in between 4 and 10 acres, produce a variety of produce. This ranges from salad, vegetables, to cut flowers, house plants and other general gardening sundries. The salad vegetable growers produce for both local customers, local markets and co-operatives which supply large national operations. {NEW DEVELOPMENT.}Much new development is being undertaken on the eastern side of the B1043 leading out of St.Neots. A new housing estate is being built,and part of the former power station site has been taken over by a new fly ash processing plant,and the H.Q.for a Building Suppliers Co.
